version_description:
- Performance improvement
- Added quick access to our latest app, Easy Pivot Point

- Fixed an issue where app crashes when viewing headline news
- Added quick access to our latest apps, Easy MACD and Easy Momentum Crossover

- Added quick access to our latest technical indicator, Easy PSAR,
- Stability improvements and general bug fixes.

- Added quick access to our latest app, EasyIndicator Dashboard which allows you to access all our indicators and tools within the same app. You no longer need to download multiple apps to access our indicators.
- Added a feedback page for you to submit suggestion/feature request to us.
